languages.text: "Почему? Ты заглянул{mf||а} под полог моего существования. Справедливо, чтобы я бросила хотя бы один взгляд на твое". {n}Кибелла бросает на вас настойчивый взгляд.{/n} "Мне не кажется, что все слова, которым должно было прозвучать сегодня, были сказаны. Возможно, ты не хочешь произносить их при... посторонних?"

traits.locale_text: "Почему же? Ты заглянул под полог моего существования — разве не справедливо, что бы я бросила хотя бы один взгляд на твое... каким бы причудливым я не считала его после того, что здесь увидела и прожила".

languages.text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"
languages.original_text: "Почему? Ты заглянул{mf||а} под полог моего существования. Справедливо, чтобы я бросила хотя бы один взгляд на твое". {n}Кибелла бросает на вас настойчивый взгляд.{/n} "Мне не кажется, что все слова, которым должно было прозвучать сегодня, были сказаны. Возможно, ты не хочешь произносить их при... посторонних?"

traits.locale_text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence. Now I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah looks at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been said today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

"Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence. Now I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah looks at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been said today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

"Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

"Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

"Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

"Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

languages.text: «¿Por qué? Ha mirado al otro lado de la cortina de mi existencia, y ahora, yo he mirado tras la suya». {n}Kibellah te mira fijamente.{/n} «No creo que hayamos oído todas las palabras que se deberían haber dicho hoy aquí. ¿Es porque no desea pronunciarlas delante de... testigos?».
languages.original_text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué? Ha mirado al otro lado de la cortina de mi existencia, y ahora, yo he mirado tras la suya». {n}Kibellah te mira fijamente.{/n} «No creo que hayamos oído todas las palabras que se deberían haber dicho hoy aquí. ¿Es porque no desea pronunciarlas delante de... testigos?».

languages.text: 「なぜ？あなたはカーテン越しに私という存在を見ていたわ。そして今、私はあなたという存在を見ている」{n}キベラはあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「今日、ここで語られるべき言葉をすべて耳にしたとは思えない。それは、あなたが…衆目の前で言いたくないから？」
languages.original_text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ？あなたはカーテン越しに私という存在を見ていたわ。そして今、私はあなたという存在を見ている」{n}キベラはあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「今日、ここで語られるべき言葉をすべて耳にしたとは思えない。それは、あなたが…衆目の前で言いたくないから？」

languages.text: “怎么了呢？你曾在幕帘之后见过我的存在，而如今，我也见到了你的存在。”{n}绮贝菈目不转睛地盯着你。{/n}“我认为，我还没有听到今晚所有该说出来的话。这是因为你不愿意在这么多……见证人面前开口吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

traits.locale_text: “怎么了呢？你曾在幕帘之后见过我的存在，而如今，我也见到了你的存在。”{n}绮贝菈目不转睛地盯着你。{/n}“我认为，我还没有听到今晚所有该说出来的话。这是因为你不愿意在这么多……见证人面前开口吗？”

languages.text: "Warum? Ihr habt hinter den Vorhang meiner Existenz geblickt und ich nun hinter den Euren." {n}Kibellah starrt dich eindringlich an.{/n} "Ich denke nicht, dass wir heute alle Worte gehört haben, die gesagt werden sollten. Liegt es daran, dass Ihr sie nicht sagen wollt vor ... Zeugen?"
languages.original_text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum? Ihr habt hinter den Vorhang meiner Existenz geblickt und ich nun hinter den Euren." {n}Kibellah starrt dich eindringlich an.{/n} "Ich denke nicht, dass wir heute alle Worte gehört haben, die gesagt werden sollten. Liegt es daran, dass Ihr sie nicht sagen wollt vor ... Zeugen?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? Vous avez regardé au-delà du voile qui dissimule mon existence, et à présent, c'est mon tour. {n}Kibellah vous regarde attentivement.{/n} Pour autant, j'ai l'impression qu'il reste encore des non-dits entre nous. Est-ce parce que vous ne souhaitez pas vous exprimer devant... témoins ? »
languages.original_text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? Vous avez regardé au-delà du voile qui dissimule mon existence, et à présent, c'est mon tour. {n}Kibellah vous regarde attentivement.{/n} Pour autant, j'ai l'impression qu'il reste encore des non-dits entre nous. Est-ce parce que vous ne souhaitez pas vous exprimer devant... témoins ? »

languages.text: "Neden? Sen, varlığımı saran perdenin ardına baktın. Şimdi de ben seninkine bakıyorum." {n}Kibellah sana dikkatle gözlerini dikiyor.{/n} "Bugün burada söylenmesi gereken tüm sözleri işittiğimizi sanmıyorum. Bunun nedeni, bu sözleri... Tanıklar önünde söylemek istememen mi?"
languages.original_text: "Why? You have looked behind the curtain at my existence, and now, I have looked at yours." {n}Kibellah stares at you intently.{/n} "I do not think that we have heard all the words that should have been spoken here today. Is it because you do not wish to say them in front of... witnesses?"
